borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: T10694 - cherry - fell due to moribund conditionT10691 - Holly - reduce all over by up to 3m to allow clear entrance into green waste compound for high sided/wide vehiclesT10562 & T10561 - Cherry - fell due to moribund conditionT10389 - plane tree - crown lift to 3m and remove single lateral limb that is crossing through the crown and causing a poor crown shapeT10005, 10012, 10391, 10390, 10013, 10387, 10388 & 10014 - London plane trees - reduce crown by up to 4 meters to bring back into shape. Trees currently overhang the glass roof and conservatory of the main club house and are causing excessive shading and leaf litterT10004 - Horse Chestnut - reduce by up to 3m behind original reduction points. The tree has been assessed and has internal decay and a history of dropping large limbs onto the lawn below which is used by club members for shade. reduce weight on unions through reduction
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
